text: khea klaw wa “xahar thi than thang sxng ca di rab ca yang mi ma thung than thang sxng wentæ chan ca bxk kab than thang sxng penkar thanay man kxn thi man ca ma thung than thang sxng nanhæla khux sing thi phracea khxng chanth rng sxn chan thæcring chan di lathing næwthang khxng klum chn phu mi sraththa tx xallxh læa phwk khea pen phwk thi ptiseth sraththa tx wan prlok
